Jx.Tree

Jx.Tree displays hierarchical data in a tree structure of folders and nodes.

Example

Extends: Jx.Widget
License
Copyright © 2008, DM Solutions Group Inc.
This file is licensed under an MIT style license
Summary
Jx.TreeJx.Tree displays hierarchical data in a tree structure of folders and nodes.
Properties
selection{Jx.Selection} the selection object for this tree.
domObj{HTMLElement} the DOM element that contains the visual representation of the tree.
Options
select{Boolean} are items in the tree selectable?  
templatethe default HTML template for a tree can be overridden
Properties
classes{Object} anobject of property to CSS class names for extracting references to DOM elements from the supplied templates. 
Functions
renderRender the Jx.Tree.
freezestop the tree from processing updates every time something is added or removed. 
thawunfreeze the tree and recursively update styles
addadd one or more items to the tree at a particular position in the tree
removeremove an item from the tree
replacereplaces one item with another
emptyrecursively empty this tree and any folders in it
findChildGet a reference to a child node by recursively searching the tree
toggleChecks if we have a folder and toggles its state between open and closed
setSelectionsets the Jx.Selection object to be used by this tree. 



Properties



selection
{Jx.Selection} the selection object for this tree.



domObj
{HTMLElement} the DOM element that contains the visual representation of the tree.



Options



select
{Boolean} are items in the tree selectable?   See Jx.Selection for other options relating to selections that can be set here.



template
the default HTML template for a tree can be overridden



Properties



classes
{Object} anobject of property to CSS class names for extracting references to DOM elements from the supplied templates.   Requires domObj element, anything else is optional.



Functions



render
render: function()
Render the Jx.Tree.



freeze
freeze: function()
stop the tree from processing updates every time something is added or removed.   Used for bulk changes, call thaw() when done updating.   Note the tree will still display the changes but it will delay potentially expensive recursion across the entire tree on every change just to update visual styles.



thaw
thaw: function()
unfreeze the tree and recursively update styles



add
add: function(item,
position)
add one or more items to the tree at a particular position in the tree
Parameters
item{Jx.Tree.Item} or an array of items to be added
position{mixed} optional location to add the items.   By default, this is ‘bottom’ meaning the items are added at the end of the list.  See Jx.Widget.List::add for options
Returns
{Jx.Tree} a reference to this object for chaining calls



remove
remove: function(item)
remove an item from the tree
Parameters
item{Jx.Tree.Item} the tree item to remove
Returns
{Jx.Tree} a reference to this object for chaining calls



replace
replace: function(item,
withItem)
replaces one item with another
Parameters
item{Jx.Tree.Item} the tree item to remove
withItem{Jx.Tree.Item} the tree item to insert
Returns
{Jx.Tree} a reference to this object for chaining calls



empty
empty: function()
recursively empty this tree and any folders in it



findChild
findChild : function(path)
Get a reference to a child node by recursively searching the tree
Parameters
path{Array} an array of labels of nodes to search for
Returns
{Object} the node or null if the path was not found



toggle
toggle: function(el,
obj)
Checks if we have a folder and toggles its state between open and closed
Returns
{Jx.Tree} a reference to this for chaining



setSelection
setSelection: function(selection)
sets the Jx.Selection object to be used by this tree.   Used primarily by <Jx.TreeFolder> to propogate a single selection object throughout a tree.
Parameters
selection{Jx.Selection} the new selection object to use
Returns
{Jx.Tree} a reference to this object for chaining









Manage selection of objects.

Render the Jx.Tree.
freeze: function()
stop the tree from processing updates every time something is added or removed. 
thaw: function()
unfreeze the tree and recursively update styles

position)
add one or more items to the tree at a particular position in the tree
remove: function(item)
remove an item from the tree

withItem)
replaces one item with another
empty: function()
recursively empty this tree and any folders in it

Get a reference to a child node by recursively searching the tree
toggle: function(el,
obj)
Checks if we have a folder and toggles its state between open and closed
setSelection: function(selection)
sets the Jx.Selection object to be used by this tree. 
Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework. 
Extends: Jx.Widget
add: function(item,
position)
add an item to the list of items at the specified position
Jx.Tree displays hierarchical data in a tree structure of folders and nodes.
